text: The black caiman (Melanosuchus niger) is a species of caiman. It is the largest living member of the Alligatoridae family. It lives along slow-moving rivers, lakes and wetlands in the Amazon Basin of South America. The black caiman has very dark skin. It can grow up to in length and betwen 70 to 300 kg weght. Category:Crocodilia Category:Reptiles of South America
title: Black caiman
